comments.content:
Hi, Mr. P.
Welcome to Xinying.
Xinying is a small town; so I do not think there is a bar as you used to go in your country.
However, most people live here are very friendly; I wish you could enjoy the life while you stay in Taiwan.
Best regards.

first.content: Thank you deVino. The town is indeed very small and as you say the people are friendly. I am sure I will settle in. Best wishes, Mr P
first.name: English only

last.content: What do you do? I teach English like most foreigners do.
last.name: English only

last.content: I am an R&D researcher in pharmaceutical industry.
